name: Only Sound Youtube (Opera GX)
description: Find and play only YouTube audio in the background (using the official embedded player).

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self'; object-src 'self'; connect-src https://www.googleapis.com/ https://i.ytimg.com/ https://www.youtube.com/; frame-src https://www.youtube.com/ https://www.youtube-nocookie.com/;
